bill_title: create a film commission within the Governor's Office of Economic Development.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to create a film commission within the Governor's Office of Economic Development. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 1-53 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: There is hereby established the South Dakota Film Commission. The commission shall be assigned to the Governor's Office of Economic Development. The commission shall facilitate, communicate, and promote the benefits of filming motion pictures, documentaries, television advertisements, television films, or any other production in the State of South Dakota. Section 2. That chapter 1-53 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The commissioner of film is the head of the South Dakota Film Commission. The commission shall be administered by the commissioner. The commissioner shall be appointed by the Governor with the advice and consent of the Senate. Section 3. That chapter 1-53 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The commission shall assist any person wanting to produce films, videos, documentaries, advertisements, or other visual media in the state. The commission may assist with: (1) Finding proper filming locations; (2) Finding necessary production supplies; and (3) Finding a local film crew. Section 4. That chapter 1-53 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The commission shall respond to any request for assistance, under section 3 of this Act, within one business day. Section 5. That chapter 1-53 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The commission shall create and maintain a website containing accurate information and resources relevant to producing visual media in the state. The website shall include: (1) General information on locally available resources; (2) Scenic photographic images or video from the state; (3) Information on active productions within in the state; (4) Industry news, including upcoming festivals; and (5) Any form or application for available production incentives. The commission may create and maintain social media pages to increase the availablity of information. The website or any social media page shall be updated at least every thirty days.
